description: Welcome to this spacious 3-bed, 3-bath townhome in the sought-after TERRAMOR community by Polygon. Offering 1,463 sqft of living space, this home features an open concept kitchen with gas range, laminate flooring, in-suite laundry, and an extra-deep 2 car tandem garage with plenty of storage. Upgrades worth $20,000, include updated flooring and carpet, new dishwasher & hood fan, new kitchen countertops and sink, new blinds, and updated bathroom caulkingâ€” all adding to the fresh & modern feel. Resort-style amenities include an outdoor pool, hot tub, steam room, full gym, yoga room, & mini golf. Walking distance to SkyTrain with easy access to SFU, Lougheed Mall, Hwy 1, Lougheed Hwy, Costco, & in catchment for Cameron Elementary & Burnaby Mountain Secondary. Open House, Dec 06 - 2 PM - 4 PM
